title: Finding "a"
text: The vertices are $$(0,6)$$ and $$(0,-6)$$, so $$a=6$$ and $$a^2=36$$.

title: Finding "c"
speech: The foci is  times, parentheses, 0 comma negative 8,  , so  c is equal to, negative 8  and  c squared, is equal to 64

title: Finding "b"
text: To solve for $$b^2$$ use $$b^2=c^2-a^2$$ and plug in known values $$b^2=64-36=28$$

title: Substitute All Values
text: Substitute $$a^2$$ and $$b^2$$ into the standard equation form, $$\frac{y^2}{a^2}-\frac{x^2}{b^2}=1$$
